description: This file defines the ContactsProvider class, which manages the state and loading of contact data within a Flutter application, including fetching contacts via an API and notifying listeners of state changes.

classes.name: ContactsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages contact list state, including loading contacts from an API and notifying listeners about changes.

methods.name: ContactsProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with the application state and loads contacts.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches contacts from the API and updates the internal contacts list, notifying listeners of state changes.
